titles.title: Entrepreneurial Incubators Development Act of 2001
To provide for business incubator activities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic Monetary Policy, Technology and Economic Growth, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Chairman.

committee.subcommittee: Domestic Monetary Policy, Technology, and Economic Growth
committee.name: House Financial Services

bill.summary: 4/4/2001--Introduced. Entrepreneurial Incubators Development Act of 2001 - Directs the Secretary of Commerce to provide financial assistance, through grants, for the establishment and support of entities that provide business incubator services (services necessary for the initiation and initial sustainment of operations of a newly established business, including legal, intellectual property, and technology services and planning) for small- and medium-sized businesses.
